game.name: EA SPORTS FC™ 26
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Chat Speech-to-text, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, HDR available
game.shortDescription: EA SPORTS FC™ 26에서 클럽은 여러분의 것입니다. 커뮤니티 피드백을 기반으로 개선된 게임플레이 경험, 새로운 시즌에 새로운 스토리라인을 제공하는 감독 라이브 챌린지, 위대한 선수들에게 영감을 받은 유형 등으로 여러분이 원하는 방식으로 플레이하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Club is Yours in EA SPORTS FC™ 26. Play your way with an overhauled gameplay experience powered by community feedback, Manager Live Challenges that bring fresh storylines to the new season, and Archetypes inspired by greats of the game.

reviewHighlights.text: BUYER BEWARE: THE GAME'S ANTI-CHEAT IS BROKEN AND WILL POSSIBLY CORRUPT ITSELF EVERY TIME IT LAUNCHES - IT WILL ALSO BREAK FC 25 AND FC 24 I refunded...
Congrat EA...same trash like always...to much bug if u guys want to buy it...wait until 90% off
